catentdesc.name: LUM Compact Size Table Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Contemporary bedside table lamp with fabric shade.
catentdesc.longdescription: An extremely simple and attractive contemporary table lamp connected with a chrome rod. Top of it is a red fabric shade. Ideal for bedside and hall table because of its compact size. Suitable for home and commercial areas.

catentdesc.name: LUM Compact Size Table Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Contemporary bedside table lamp with fabric shade.
catentdesc.longdescription: An extremely simple and attractive contemporary table lamp connected with a chrome rod. Top of it is a red fabric shade. Ideal for bedside and hall table because of its compact size. Suitable for home and commercial areas.

catentdesc.name: LUM Ceiling Pendant Light
catentdesc.shortdescription: White emboss shade hanging ceiling pendant light.
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple ceiling pendant light with white emboss shade hanging from a chrome rod. Perfect for top of dinner tables and kitchen island. Ambient lighting from the colored shades gives a beautiful mood to the surrounding.

catentdesc.name: LUM Ceiling Pendant Light
catentdesc.shortdescription: White emboss shade hanging ceiling pendant light.
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple ceiling pendant light with white emboss shade hanging from a chrome rod. Perfect for top of dinner tables and kitchen island. Ambient lighting from the colored shades gives a beautiful mood to the surrounding.

catentdesc.name: LUM Corner Floor Lamps
catentdesc.shortdescription: Simple long floor lamp with bold shade topping a chrome base.
catentdesc.longdescription: Elegant floor light for living room, bedside corner, indoor halls . This lamp has a long chrome base and a wide red bell-shaped shade which gives it a traditional look but the bold pop colour puts a transitional aspect to it.

catentdesc.name: LUM Corner Floor Lamps
catentdesc.shortdescription: Simple long floor lamp with bold shade topping a chrome base.
catentdesc.longdescription: Elegant floor light for living room, bedside corner, indoor halls . This lamp has a long chrome base and a wide red bell-shaped shade which gives it a traditional look but the bold pop colour puts a transitional aspect to it.

catentdesc.name: Alumina Sphere Ceiling Pendant Light
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sphere shaped aluminium pendant light hanging from chrome rod.
catentdesc.longdescription: Modern looking sphere-shaped aluminum ceiling pendant light finished with a hanging chrome rod. The small opening gives a direct light and makes a ideal for hanging it above kitchen islands and hallways.

catentdesc.name: Alumina Sphere Ceiling Pendant Light
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sphere shaped aluminium pendant light hanging from chrome rod.
catentdesc.longdescription: Modern looking sphere-shaped aluminum ceiling pendant light finished with a hanging chrome rod. The small opening gives a direct light and makes a ideal for hanging it above kitchen islands and hallways.

catentdesc.name: Alumina Chandelier Style Pendant Light
catentdesc.shortdescription: Ceiling pendant light with clear droplets in a three step metal base.
catentdesc.longdescription: Traditional chandelier style pendant light with clear acrylic droplets in a three step metal base. The jewel like beads gives the space an elegant sparkling style. Very affordable, so you do not have to spend thousands of dollars on lighting.

catentdesc.name: Alumina Chandelier Style Pendant Light
catentdesc.shortdescription: Ceiling pendant light with clear droplets in a three step metal base.
catentdesc.longdescription: Traditional chandelier style pendant light with clear acrylic droplets in a three step metal base. The jewel like beads gives the space an elegant sparkling style. Very affordable, so you do not have to spend thousands of dollars on lighting.

catentdesc.name: Alumina Long Neck Floor Lamp with Round Shade
catentdesc.shortdescription: White sphere-shape shade connecting to long rood with wound base.
catentdesc.longdescription: Unique looking metal base floor lamp with slim neck rod topped with white sphere-shape shade. The fabric texture of the shade gives a transitional mood to the room. Great for putting it in any room corners.

catentdesc.name: Alumina Long Neck Floor Lamp with Round Shade
catentdesc.shortdescription: White sphere-shape shade connecting to long rood with wound base.
catentdesc.longdescription: Unique looking metal base floor lamp with slim neck rod topped with white sphere-shape shade. The fabric texture of the shade gives a transitional mood to the room. Great for putting it in any room corners.

catentdesc.name: Alumina Bendable Desk Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black desk lamp with adjustable arm and metal shade.
catentdesc.longdescription: Contemporary desk lamp with large black metal shade top of an adjustable arm for light positioning. Gives choices where to point direct light when reading. Excellent for study tables and work surface.

catentdesc.name: Alumina Bendable Desk Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black desk lamp with adjustable arm and metal shade.
catentdesc.longdescription: Contemporary desk lamp with large black metal shade top of an adjustable arm for light positioning. Gives choices where to point direct light when reading. Excellent for study tables and work surface.

catentdesc.name: Alumina Sequence Shade Chandelier
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black string shade chandelier with hanging metal beads.
catentdesc.longdescription: Traditional looking chandelier with sequence black shades and metal beads hanging from the chrome finish. The bell shape black shades gives a subtle mood and stylish look to the space.

catentdesc.name: Alumina Sequence Shade Chandelier
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black string shade chandelier with hanging metal beads.
catentdesc.longdescription: Traditional looking chandelier with sequence black shades and metal beads hanging from the chrome finish. The bell shape black shades gives a subtle mood and stylish look to the space.

catentdesc.name: LUM Compact Size Table Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Simple table lamp with chocolate shade on top of a chrome rod.
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple contemporary table lamp with a bold chocolate cloth shade on top of a chrome rod over a metal base. Great for hall tables, living area and bedside tables. Perfect ambient lighting for a traditional home.

catentdesc.name: LUM Compact Size Table Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Simple table lamp with chocolate shade on top of a chrome rod.
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple contemporary table lamp with a bold chocolate cloth shade on top of a chrome rod over a metal base. Great for hall tables, living area and bedside tables. Perfect ambient lighting for a traditional home.

catentdesc.name: Modern Houseware Glass Base Table Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Inverted cone glass base with ivory colour drum shade.
catentdesc.longdescription: Unique orange inverted hand-blown glass base contrasting with a ivory drum shade. Very light weight but gives significant light to put beautiful ambiance. Energy efficient CFL bulbs can be used to give the same color of lighting.

catentdesc.name: Modern Houseware Glass Base Table Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Inverted cone glass base with ivory colour drum shade.
catentdesc.longdescription: Unique orange inverted hand-blown glass base contrasting with a ivory drum shade. Very light weight but gives significant light to put beautiful ambiance. Energy efficient CFL bulbs can be used to give the same color of lighting.

catentdesc.name: Modern Houseware Glass Ball Base Table Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Yellow glass ball base on chrome rod with ivory shade.
catentdesc.longdescription: Modern decorative table lamp with 3 yellow glass ball on chrome base with smooth drum shade. The bold glass base contrasting with the shade gives a artful affect to the room. Suitable for bedside tables, family rooms and hallways.

catentdesc.name: Modern Houseware Glass Ball Base Table Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Yellow glass ball base on chrome rod with ivory shade.
catentdesc.longdescription: Modern decorative table lamp with 3 yellow glass ball on chrome base with smooth drum shade. The bold glass base contrasting with the shade gives a artful affect to the room. Suitable for bedside tables, family rooms and hallways.

catentdesc.name: Modern Houseware Hanging Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: A red hanging lamp in a triangular shape.
catentdesc.longdescription: A hanging lamp with red ambient shades to add a romantic mood to your room. Perfect for your bedroom or your children's room. Easy set up so you do not have to pay electricians to set it up.

catentdesc.name: Modern Houseware Hanging Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: A red hanging lamp in a triangular shape.
catentdesc.longdescription: A hanging lamp with red ambient shades to add a romantic mood to your room. Perfect for your bedroom or your children's room. Easy set up so you do not have to pay electricians to set it up.

catentdesc.name: Modern Houseware Arch Floor Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Red metal shade hanging on an arch shape sweeping neck.
catentdesc.longdescription: Modern and different arch shape floor lamp with red metal shade hanging from a sweeping neck on a square base. Ideal for den and study room.

catentdesc.name: Modern Houseware Arch Floor Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Red metal shade hanging on an arch shape sweeping neck.
catentdesc.longdescription: Modern and different arch shape floor lamp with red metal shade hanging from a sweeping neck on a square base. Ideal for den and study room.

catentdesc.name: Modern Houseware Vintage Floor Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Vintage print shade connected to a rod with tripod base.
catentdesc.longdescription: Traditional and modern floor lamp with vintage black and white bell shape shade connected to a chrome rod with a tripod base. Has a very versatile look making it suitable for offices and lofts.

catentdesc.name: Modern Houseware Vintage Floor Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Vintage print shade connected to a rod with tripod base.
catentdesc.longdescription: Traditional and modern floor lamp with vintage black and white bell shape shade connected to a chrome rod with a tripod base. Has a very versatile look making it suitable for offices and lofts.

catentdesc.name: Alumina Gooseneck Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Gray gooseneck lamp with bendable arm.
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple gooseneck lamp in gray. Lamp top is attached to a bendable arm connected to a circular base. Excellent for study table and office tables.

catentdesc.name: Alumina Gooseneck Lamp

catentdesc.longdescription: Simple gooseneck lamp in gray. Lamp top is attached to a bendable arm connected to a circular base. Excellent for study table and office tables.

catentdesc.name: Modern Houseware Hinged Desk Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Simple desk lamp with adjustable arm.
catentdesc.longdescription: Contemporary hinged desk lamp in black with flexible head. Lamp has two adjustable arms from the base and middle. Can be moved up and down or side to side.

catentdesc.name: Modern Houseware Hinged Desk Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Simple desk lamp with adjustable arm.
catentdesc.longdescription: Contemporary hinged desk lamp in black with flexible head. Lamp has two adjustable arms from the base and middle. Can be moved up and down or side to side.

catentdesc.name: LUM Orange Jointed Desk Lamp
catentdesc.shortdescription: Orange head jointed lamp with a with adjustable chrome arms on a round base.
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple jointed desk lamp with orange lamp top attached to the adjustable chrome arms. The lamp can be moved up and down to put direct light.

catentdesc.longdescription: Simple jointed desk lamp with orange lamp top attached to the adjustable chrome arms. The lamp can be moved up and down to put direct light.

catentdesc.name: LUM Chrome Base Table Lamp

catentdesc.longdescription: Chrome hand-blown base for table lamp with a long bell shaped shade to give it a traditional old look. Will make your bedroom or living room look much brighter and beautiful.
